svg.text: @api · CustomEvent · Shared State · Lightning Message Service · Platform Events
✗ Objects pass by ref — clone to mutate
▸ Use @api method() to call child fn
✗ Event name must be all lowercase only
✓ Works across any component tree depth
⚠ Siblings cannot communicate directly — route via parent or use LMS for cross-tree siblings.
✓ Unregister in disconnectedCallback() to prevent memory leaks.
✓ Replay ID: -1 = latest event, -2 = replay all stored events.
Communication Decision Framework — Expert Must Know
Owner passes config or data to component
Child needs to push data back up
Action in child needs parent to react
Siblings share a direct common parent
Polling or scheduled refresh is sufficient
